cast.overview: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.
cast.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves

crew.overview: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.
crew.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves

details.biography:
Adam Behan is an Irish stunt performer and actor based in Dublin, Ireland. He graduated from Bow Street's Screen Acting Program in 2016.

Behan possesses various specialised skills, including fight performance and swordsmanship, horse riding and saddle falls, wire work and jerk-backs, full and partial body burns, water stunts, and firearms training. He holds certifications such as PADI Divemaster, IRATA Level 1 Rope Access Technician, and AP8 Level 1 Stunt Rigging. Additionally, he has a brown belt in kickboxing and licenses for heavy goods vehicles and powerboats.

Behan is a member of Stunt Register Ireland and has collaborated with renowned stunt teams like the Devils Horsemen.
details.name: Adam Behan
